title: Quiz: FQE Feb 2021 Past Paper
description: Final Qualifying Examination from Feb 2021 covering elevator files, appointment systems, and bed returns. (Covers duplicate file 2022f)

questions.question: The largest elevator file for filing patient master index cards would probably hold... index cards.
questions.explanation: Standard capacity for large mechanical elevator files is approx 90,000 cards.

questions.question: Which one of the following is not a type of appointment system?
questions.explanation: Returned appointment is a visit type, not a system.

questions.question: Which one of the following is an equipment for recording appointment?
questions.explanation: Visible edge sheets are used for manual scheduling.

questions.question: Which of the following information is not included on the DBR?
questions.explanation: DBR tracks inpatients. Appointments are outpatient.

questions.question: Discuss the value of health records documentation to patients, hospital, health workers, researchers, and teaching. (Long Answer)
questions.explanation:
Values:

  • Patient: Continuity, evidence.
  • Hospital: Planning, legal defense, billing.
  • Health Worker: Communication, decision making.
  • Researcher: Data source.
  • Teaching: Case studies.
